title: Harbor Master, Pampas Marina AB, Stockholm
details: Utilized superior data visualizing and data management skills

title: Marinentreprenad tekniker, Pampas Marinentreprenad AB, Stockholm
details: Worked well independently and on a team to solve pr oblems

title: Specialist, Apple Inc, Pentagon City, Washington, D.C.
details: Served as a friendly, hardworking, and punctual employee.

title: Boat Captain, KoOlina Ocean Adventures, Honolulu
details: My responsibilties included overall safety for crew and customers on the boat and in the water. Attentiveness and the ability to make fast and difficult decisions were essential.

title: Boat Captain at Hawaiian Ocean Adventure/ Disney Aulani, Honolulu
details: Captain for tours in cooperation with Disney Aulani, part-time position. As Captain I sailed a handbuilt Hawaiian sailing canoe, taking tourist out on the west side of Oahu

title: Store Manager & Master boat builder at Go-Bananas Watersports, Honolulu
details: Areas of duties inluded custom building of kayaks, training of new personnel and managing the sales floor. As master boat builder I was responsible for the quality control of craftsmanship including plastic welding and repair of kayaks and boards using different construction techniques.
